name: react-bottom-room
description:
React Bottom Room is a lightweight, easy-to-use React component that provides a dynamic bottom navigation bar for your web applications. Inspired by the react-headroom package, react-bottom-room hides your bottom navigation bar when scrolling down and reveals it when scrolling up, improving the user experience by maximizing screen real estate without sacrificing easy navigation access.

Key Features:

Dynamic Visibility: The navigation bar automatically hides when scrolling down and shows when scrolling up, providing a clean and immersive user experience.
Easy to Use: Just wrap your navigation bar component with react-bottom-room and it handles the rest.
Customizable: Supports all standard div attributes, allowing you to customize the navigation bar to fit your needs.
Lightweight: With a small footprint, it doesn’t add unnecessary weight to your project.
Whether you’re building a single-page application or a complex web app, react-bottom-room offers a simple and effective solution for enhancing your bottom navigation.
